Package uk.ac.cf.milling.utils.data

Class IoUtils

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.cf.milling.utils.data.IoUtils
public class IoUtils extends Object
Convenience methods for reading and writing csv files and reports to disk
Author:
Theocharis Alexopoulos

    • readCSVFile

      public static List<String[]> readCSVFile​(String pathToFile, int titleLines)
      Parameters:
      pathToFile - - The path to the .csv file to read from
      titleLines - - Number of lines containing title/header
      Returns:
      A list of String arrays containing the data of the .csv file

    • readCSVFile

      public static List<String[]> readCSVFile​(String filePath, int startLine, int endLine)
      Parameters:
      filePath - - Path of CSV file to read
      startLine - - File line to begin reading from (First line index is 1)
      endLine - - File line to stop reading at
      Returns:
      A list of String arrays containing the specified lines data

      public static String[] getCSVTitles​(String filePath)
      Returns:

    • getCSVValues

      public static double[][] getCSVValues​(String filePath)
      Parameters:
      filePath - - file path of the CSV file to read
      Returns:
      a double[rows][columns] that contains values of csv. The lines that contain text (ex. titles) are omitted.

    • getCSVValues

      public static double[][] getCSVValues​(File file)
      Parameters:
      file - - CSV file
      Returns:
      a double[rows][columns] that contains values of csv. The lines that contain text (ex. titles) are omitted.

    • getCSVTitleIndex

      public static int getCSVTitleIndex​(String csvFilePath, String title)
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - - path to the CSV file
      title - - title to find index of
      Returns:
      the index of the specified title (counting from 0)

    • getCSVTitleIndexes

      public static int[] getCSVTitleIndexes​(String csvFilePath, String[] titles)
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - - path to the CSV file
      titles - - array of titles to find index of
      Returns:
      int[] containing the indexes of titles array.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • addColumnToCSVFile

      public static void addColumnToCSVFile​(String filePath, String[] column)
      Adds a column to the end of the specified csv file
      Parameters:
      filePath - - The path of the csv file that the column will be added
      column - - String[] containing the new column data. Each cell is a separate line in the file

    • addColumnToCSVFile

      public static void addColumnToCSVFile​(String filePath, String title, double[] data)
      Adds a column to the end of the specified CSV file
      Parameters:
      filePath - - The path of the CSV file that the column will be added
      title - - Title of the newly inserted column
      data - - The data of the new column. Every cell of the array is a new line

    • addColumnToCSVFile

      public static void addColumnToCSVFile​(String filePath, String title, long[] data)
      Adds a column to the end of the specified CSV file
      Parameters:
      filePath - - The path of the CSV file that the column will be added
      title - - Title of the newly inserted column
      data - - The data of the new column. Every cell of the array is a new line

    • writeCSVFile

      public static void writeCSVFile​(String pathToFile, List<String[]> entries)
      Parameters:
      pathToFile - - path of the .csv file to write to
      entries - - data to write to the file. Every array represents one line of the csv file and each of its elements will automatically be separated by comma

    • writeCSVFile

      public static void writeCSVFile​(String pathToFile, double[][] data)
      Parameters:
      pathToFile - - The path of the .csv file to write to
      data - - a 2D table containing the data to write to the specified file

    • writeCSVFile

      public static void writeCSVFile​(String pathToFile, int[][] data)
      Parameters:
      pathToFile - - The path of the .csv file to write to
      data - - a 2D table containing the data to write to the specified file

    • writeFile

      public static void writeFile​(String filePath, String fileData)
      Writes to the specified output file deleting previous contents
      Parameters:
      outputFilePath - - the filepath of the output file
      kpis - - the KPIs calculated from GCode simulation

    • writeFile

      public static void writeFile​(String filePath, long[] data)
      Parameters:
      filePath - - the filepath of the output file
      data - - an array of type long to write in the file

    • checkFileExists

      public static boolean checkFileExists​(String filePath)
      Parameters:
      filePath - - path to the file to check if exists
      Returns:
